name: Maxi Dress
description: Elegant maxi dress perfect for summer evenings. Features a flowing silhouette with adjustable straps and a flattering empire waist. Made from breathable, lightweight fabric that drapes beautifully.

name: Summer Dress
description: Chic summer dress with adjustable straps. Perfect for beach days and casual outings. Features a comfortable fit with a flattering A-line silhouette and side pockets.

name: Leather Jacket
description: Classic leather jacket with a modern twist. Features a cropped fit, zip front closure, and quilted detailing. Made from premium faux leather with a soft, supple feel.

name: Blouse
description: Versatile blouse perfect for office wear or casual outings. Features a relaxed fit, button-down front, and breathable cotton fabric. Easy to style with skirts, pants, or jeans.

name: High-Waisted Jeans
description: Comfortable high-waisted jeans with a modern fit. Features stretch denim for maximum comfort, classic five-pocket styling, and a flattering high-rise design.

name: Mini Skirt
description: Stylish mini skirt, perfect for casual occasions. Features a comfortable elastic waistband and versatile length.

name: Denim Jacket
description: Classic denim jacket with a modern fit. Features a comfortable relaxed silhouette, chest pockets, and adjustable waist tabs. Perfect for layering in any season.

name: Hoodie
description: Comfortable hoodie made from soft cotton blend. Features a relaxed fit, drawstring hood, and kangaroo pocket. Perfect for casual wear and outdoor activities.

name: Linen Pants
description: Breathable linen pants perfect for warm weather. Features a relaxed fit, drawstring waist, and comfortable straight leg. Ideal for casual and semi-formal occasions.

name: Polo Shirt
description: Classic polo shirt with a modern fit. Features breathable pique cotton fabric, three-button placket, and ribbed collar. Perfect for casual and business casual settings.

name: Button-down Shirt
description: Versatile button-down shirt suitable for office and casual wear. Features a comfortable fit, classic collar, and breathable cotton fabric. Easy to style and maintain.

name: T-shirt
description: Fun dinosaur-themed t-shirt perfect for kids who love adventure. Features a comfortable cotton fabric, vibrant print, and relaxed fit. Machine washable and durable.

name: Hoodie
description: Cozy hoodie designed specifically for kids' comfort. Features soft cotton blend fabric, adjustable drawstring hood, and convenient front pocket. Perfect for cool weather.

name: Shorts
description: Comfortable shorts perfect for active kids. Features stretchy fabric, elastic waistband, and multiple pockets. Ideal for sports, playtime, and everyday wear.

name: Sweatpants
description: Comfortable sweatpants with a modern jogger style. Features soft cotton blend fabric, elastic waistband with drawstring, and ribbed cuffs. Perfect for lounging and casual wear.

name: Coat
description: Waterproof raincoat perfect for keeping kids dry in wet weather. Features a hood, zip front closure, and adjustable cuffs. Made from durable, lightweight material.
